text:
Exceptional wellness service provided - the attention to detail, professionalism, and genuine care made a noticeable difference in my experience.
It's clear that the team is committed to promoting well-being, and I truly appreciated the high level of service. Keep up the great work!
** Compliment to Therapist #33 **
Thank you for the complimentary Eye-mask &  Ear Candling too üëç

Thanks for the amazing service, I recently visited xinlong for 120min massage, and it was incredibly skilled and attractive. If you‚Äôre looking for professional, clean and holistic wellness experience, xinlong is a must visit.

I opted for the 90-minute foot massage with head, shoulder, and back massage, and it was pure bliss! The place is a bit pricier than other JB massage spots I‚Äôve been to, but for the level of care and quality, it‚Äôs still reasonable (though locals might find it a bit steep).

My masseur, 23, was amazing‚Äîso skilled and thoughtful! He was completely in tune with what I needed, applying just the right amount of pressure. He even served me tea during the session and a dessert afterward. The ambiance was peaceful and quiet, making the whole experience even more relaxing.

The only small hiccup was the front desk staff, who came off a bit rude when asked for more details about the TCM massage üòï

I recently went to massage for this place, the masseuse No 23 is very talented with professional skills.  I really happy his service.  Yesterday I have bring my some other friends also to visit and I look for No 23 masseuse for me. He really humble and knowing his tactics to pressing to points. Management really glad to have such a professional staff like him. Pls do Rewards him and appropriate his talent. I will repeat again because of him. All the best to the masseuse No 23.

nicely decorated. Situated in the brand new & pleasant quiet neighbourhood of Sunway, surrounded by Korean restaurants. Staff are friendly. Price is quite high by Malaysian standard, but ok for Singaporeans.

Got therapists from China, Vietnam & Burma.

Therapist no. 17 is skilful and does a  good job.  No.18 is weaker.

It's about 10 to 15 minutes' drive from 2nd Link Johor checkpoint.
